channel.title: Comments on: Book: Installing, Configuring and Managing VMware vSphere 5.5/6.0

item.title: By: Jamie N

item.description: The course goes into the details not just an overview, the instructors are easy going, great guys and were able to explain the technology whenever my brain evaporated into the clouds ;-)
